name: DemoGame Wallcoeur 2022
description:
DemoGame 2022 

Δ-Type : 

Demoreel Third person controller

Sorry for the bugs :D I'm not developper but I try ! Everything was created by me, shader, texture, vfx, characontroller...on Unity3D

To move you have to use ZQSD (switch your computer to QWERTY if you want to use WASD).

You can zoom in or out with the mouse wheel.

Δ-Platform : 

PC - Keyboard/Mouse

To close the project you have to press alt F4 (sorry about that).
